fields.message: Funding for the newspaper project came from donations and grants. The estate of Alice L. Gilbert (former Perry Librarian) and a grant from Flint Energies Foundation funded the digitization of the newspaper along with permissions granted by the Houston Home Journal.

fields.name: R.J. Taylor Foundation
fields.message: Funding for the digitization of this title was provided by R.J. Taylor, Jr. Foundation.
Funding for the digitization of this title was provided by Roman Catholic Diocese of Savannah.
Funding for the digitization of this title was provided by Hargrett Rare Book and Manuscript Library.
Funding for the digitization of this title was provided by Taylor County Historical-Genealogical Society and the Flint Energies Foundation.
Funding for the digitization of this title was provided by Randy Sullivan.
Funding for the digitization of this title was provided by the Cuba Family Archives, William Breman Jewish Heritage Museum and Srochi family of Atlanta.
Funding for the digitization of this title was provided by the Mercer University Libraries.
Funding for the digitization of this title was provided in kind by the Athens-Clarke County Library along with permissions granted by Flagpole.
Funding for the digitization of this title was provided by Georgia HomePLACE, a project of the Georgia Public Library Service.
